> **Site Description**  
A platform dedicated to mastering and sharing advanced prompt engineering techniques for Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT-4, Claude, and others completely in Bengali language.

---

## **Main Content**

- [Prompt Engineering Guides](https://prompt-panda.pages.dev)  
  Comprehensive tutorials and best practices for crafting effective prompts.

---

## **Expertise**

- **Prompt Engineering**  
  Specialized knowledge in optimizing prompts for accuracy, creativity, and reliability across various LLMs.

- **AI Tooling**  
  Experience with Python libraries (e.g., LangChain, LlamaIndex) and API integrations for automating prompt workflows.

- **Educational Content**  
  Creating clear, actionable resources to help users at all levels improve their AI interaction skills.
